Package mil.nga.geopackage.tiles.features

Class DefaultFeatureTiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.geopackage.tiles.features.FeatureTiles
      • mil.nga.geopackage.tiles.features.DefaultFeatureTiles
  • public class DefaultFeatureTiles
extends FeatureTiles
    Default Feature Tiles implementation using Java AWT to draw
    Since:
    1.1.2
    Author:
    osbornb
